doc.field: Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records

The CPUSA is comprised of several commissions and departments; many exist only at the national level, though some exist at the district level as well. Commissions develop policy on ideological issues that concern the CPUSA such as labor or African American equality, while departments are tasked with implementing policy in specific areas such as education or party building. Despite the clear distinction between the roles of each body, "commission" and "department" were sometimes used interchangeably by Party membership. The records in this series reflect the work of a range of commissions and departments by means of correspondence, internal discussion documents, meeting minutes, and reports.
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
